verbose_text: The expression of the RUNX2 gene correlated in trend with the hypermethylation of the RUNX2 gene (rho = -0.29, p = 0.13) whereas no correlations were observed between RUNX2 independent gene expression (WNT3A, CTNNB1, DKK) and RUNX2 gene hypermethylation.
evidence: RUNX2-independent gene expression (WNT3A, CTNNB1, DKK) and RUNX2 gene hypermethylation
